ukm:Metadata.dc:title: Tribunals (Scotland) Act 2014
ukm:Metadata.dc:description: An Act of the Scottish Parliament to establish the First-tier Tribunal for Scotland and the Upper Tribunal for Scotland; and for connected purposes.

PrimaryPrelims.Title: Tribunals (Scotland) Act 2014
PrimaryPrelims.LongTitle: An Act of the Scottish Parliament to establish the First-tier Tribunal for Scotland and the Upper Tribunal for Scotland; and for connected purposes.

DateOfEnactment.DateText: The Bill for this Act of the Scottish Parliament was passed by the Parliament on 11th March 2014 and received Royal Assent on 15th April 2014
